pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flake8-SARIF============This is a plugin for Flake8 that will format the output as SARIF.Installation------------.. code-block:: bash pip install flake8-sarifUsage-----.. code-block:: bash flake8 --format=sarif ...Competitors-----------None that I could find on PyPIMaintenance Policy------------------This project is seeking maintainers. Please open an issue if you're interestedand ensure that you've read the PyCQA's `Code of Conduct`_... _Code of Conduct: http://meta.pycqa.org/en/latest/code-of-conduct.html
